body.name: Dash Camera for Cars, Dashcam 1080P FHD Dash Cam Front 3 inch Screen Dashboard Camera with 120° Wide Angle, Super Night Vision, Loop Recording, Motion Detection, WDR, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 26 mins
features: 🚙【Dash Cam Front 1080P FHD】Car camera is equipped with super high resolution 1080P FHD Lens 120°wide angle. The car dashcam captures the license plates and road signs clearly even at night, thus ensuring to get you the best footage. 3.0 inch dash camera to help you clearly see every detail in the process of playing car video, bringing a better visual experience. Warm Tips: The SD card is not included in the dashcam package.

🚙【Loop Recording & Emergency Accident Locks】Seamless loop recording dash cam will overwrite the old footage with new content when the card is full. The car dash camera built-in variable sensitivity G-Sensor automatically detects a sudden collision and immediately saves the relevant footage and locks it to SOS file. Thus preventing any overwriting and thereby protecting your video evidence. Keep you away from driving disputes.

🚙【Dash Cams with Parking Mode】Dash cams automatically power on and start recording as soon as impact is detected, thus providing you video evidence if your car is scratched by someone in the parking lot. Hence, ensuring your peace of mind with complete 24x7 monitoring of your car. The car camera needs a constant power supply, either from an external battery pack or hard wire.

🚙【Easy Install & Operate】Dashcam user manual can be found in the package or product page. This camera for car is very easy to install and operate. A suction mount could be easily attached to your windshield in a few minutes. Then connect to the power supply. The car dash cam will start recording immediately after ignition.

🚙【7x24 Hours Support】Every customer is fully covered by 1-YEAR WARRANTY.. If you have any queries about this car dash cam,please reach our customer service team who will immediately respond within 24 hours, you will get 7x24 hours technical support.

3" Ultra Clear LCD Screen This dashcam is equipped with a 3" super large LCD Display that can show the real-time image, helps you see every detail as clear as possible when playing back and brings a better visual experience. Super Night Vision Dashcam with the revolutionary super night vision technology, the car camera could capture clearer videos and photos even in low-light night conditions. You no need to worry about over exposure and under exposure. 120° Ultra-wide Field of View Dash cams 1080P FHD with the 120 degrees angle, wide field of view reduces the blind spots and captures more details, recording of every driving moment. It can maximize the safety protection of you and your car.

G-sensor (Emergency Recording) The car dash cam with built-in adjustable G-Sensor, current footage will be locked and protected in the SD card when the G-Sensor is triggered by sudden shake collision, provide you significant evidence when something unexpected happens. Loop recording The dashcam with loop recording function, new recordings will automatically overwrite oldest recordings when the memory card is full.(Note: locked files will not be overwritten) Easy installation & Friendly Design According to the method shown in the figure, the driving recorder is easy to install with the car charger due to the long charging cable, it will not block your sight and safer choice when driving, and it is super easy to install and operate.
